title: Momentus deploys additional satellites from Vigoride tug
summary: Momentus has deployed additional satellites from its first space tug that encountered technical problems shortly after its launch in May and is moving forward with a second launch later this year.

title: ULA’s Atlas 5 rocket moved to launch pad with U.S. military missile warning satellite
summary: United Launch Alliance’s next Atlas 5 rocket rolled out to its launch pad Tuesday at Cape Canaveral for a fiery blastoff at dawn Thursday with a U.S. military missile warning satellite.

title: Biden to sign chips bill in a boost for satellite supply chains
summary: A bill that would give $52 billion in subsidies to U.S. chip makers promises to galvanize domestic production, although it will take time to alleviate a semiconductor shortage that has been delaying satellite projects.

title: Report: U.S. should push for global rules on space traffic management
summary: It's unclear how much longer industries and governments can continue to operate safely in space without globally coordinated traffic management, says a new report from the Atlantic Council

title: Why space debris keeps falling out of the sky—and will continue to do so
summary: "All spacefaring nations should follow established best practices."
